text: Lepidozia azorica is a species of liverwort in the Lepidoziaceae family. It is found on mainland Portugal and Spain and on the Canary Islands.Bryophytes of the Canary-Islands, an Annotated Checklist ==References== ;Notes ;Sources * Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Lepidozia azorica. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Lepidoziaceae Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lepidozia azorica
